functionalRequirements.title: Create to-do
functionalRequirements.description: A user can create a task by providing a title and an optional description.

nonFunctionalRequirements.title: Response time
nonFunctionalRequirements.description: API response < 500ms for 95% of the requests.

useCases.title: User registers a new to-do
useCases.description: The user provides a title and optionally a description to create a to-do.
